application.name: 周边商户
application.ability: 提供商家信息的添加、聚合及LBS的查询。
application.author: 5kym.com

manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_business`; CREATE TABLE `ims_business` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `thumb` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(1000) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `phone` varchar(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `qq` varchar(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `province` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `city` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `dist` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `address` varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lng` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lat` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `industry1` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `industry2` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_lat_lng` (`lng`,`lat`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
